overview.description: This guide introduces the concept of embeddings and their role in transforming various data types (e.g., text, images, audio) into numerical vector representations.
overview.purpose: To capture semantic relationships within datasets, enabling advanced analysis and visualization.

key_concepts.embeddings: Numerical vectors representing real-world objects, capturing semantic meaning.
key_concepts.embedding_models: Neural networks trained to generate embeddings for specific data types.

step_1.title: Prepare Data
details: Ensure data is in a supported format (e.g., CSV for tabular data, image files for visual data).
Include metadata columns such as labels, timestamps, or categories for enhanced analysis.

step_2.title: Select an Embedding Model
details: Choose a pre-trained model suitable for the data type (e.g., text embeddings for natural language processing tasks).

step_3.title: Generate Embeddings
details: Use the Nomic Atlas SDK or API to process the data and generate embeddings.

details.code:
from nomic import AtlasDataset
dataset = AtlasDataset(name='My Dataset')
dataset.add_data(data)
embeddings = dataset.generate_embeddings(model='text_model')

step_4.title: Store and Visualize
details: Save generated embeddings for future use.
Visualize embeddings using Atlas's interactive tools.

best_practices.data_quality: Ensure input data is clean and well-structured to improve embedding accuracy.
best_practices.model_selection: Match the embedding model to the data type and analysis goal.
best_practices.metadata_usage: Leverage metadata for filtering and contextual insights during visualization.

use_cases.text_analysis: Extract semantic meaning from documents, social media posts, or research papers.
use_cases.image_processing: Identify patterns and clusters in visual datasets.
use_cases.audio_analysis: Analyze sound files for speech recognition or sentiment detection.

conclusion.summary: Embeddings are a powerful tool for transforming raw data into meaningful representations.
conclusion.tools: Nomic Atlas simplifies the embedding generation process, providing robust tools for analysis and visualization.
